reviewtext: After trying the memorex lens cleaner obtained from wal mart and returning it because neither of my computers' CD/DVD drives recognized it, I bought this product [the Maxell CD-340] from Amazon. Shipping via prime was rapid and arrival was in excellent condition. The product works just fine* thus hardening my position/opinion that Maxell products are of good quality and Memorex products are of lower quality.* My computer's drive can now burn a music CD at full speed and make a product which is playable on the same drive. Before cleaning, I had to reduce writing speed from "fastest" to "medium" to burn readable disks.
